card.name: Balga Do Raiba, Matchless Dragon Phantom

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Earth Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Dragon, put it. Otherwise, put it into your mana zone.

property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWER ATTACKER} +5000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play {GACHINKO JUDGE}. If you win,take an extra turn after this one ({GACHINKO JUDGE}: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)
